projects.title: Project Alpha
projects.description: This was the first website I ever built. I created it to learn the basics of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and responsive design. It includes my profile, navigation, project links, and a clean UI, giving me a solid foundation for more advanced web development concepts.

projects.title: Project Bravo
projects.description: Drag-and-drop card suits with live score and timer. Includes a validated settings form, Web Storage, and Bootstrap 5 UI.

projects.title: Project Charlie
projects.description: A collaborative CIS 376 class project featuring a collection of mini web games built by UNA students. The site allows users to browse, search, and play games created by different classmates, showcasing creativity and JavaScript development skills.

projects.title: Project Delta
projects.description: A UI/UX improvement prototype that redesigns tiny mobile search boxes. The project introduces a “bubble search” interface where each word becomes a tappable bubble, making editing terms faster and easier on mobile devices.

projects.title: Micro Data Center
projects.description: A project that transforms a Raspberry Pi into a micro data center, showcasing skills in hardware setup, networking, and cloud integration.

projects.title: Digital Maintenance & Inventory System
projects.description: A web application prototype for managing digital maintenance tasks and inventory tracking.
